subject: Football
Concussions
lead_paragraph: The N.F.L.’s top kicker, Matt Prater, who has been in the league’s drug program since a D.U.I. arrest in 2011, violated the league’s substance-abuse policy by drinking beer.
snippet: The N.F.L.’s top kicker, Matt Prater, who has been in the league’s drug program since a D.U.I. arrest in 2011, violated the league’s substance-abuse policy by drinking beer.
